name: Sokoban for Beginners
description:
Your goal is to push the boxes to the goal areas. Sound simple? The rules of the game are, but you will be surprised at the challenges that can arise. This gentle introduction to the world of Sokoban puzzles will have you addicted in no time!

• A gentle introduction to the world of Sokoban puzzles
• Carefully selected puzzles for beginners
• Challenge more difficult puzzles once you get the hang of it
• Free, with no ads or unwanted permissions
